casebody.data:
Township of Sewickley
v.
Tracy Hampshire, David Hampshire, a Married Couple, Sewickly Township Zoning Hearing Board v. Jonathan C. Turik, Kelly A. Turik, a Married Couple; Petition of Tracy Hampshire, David Hampshire NO. 82 WAL 2016 Supreme Court of Pennsylvania July 12, 2016 Appeal from the Commonwealth Court.

Disposition: Denied.
